attributes.title: PLEASE DONâ€™T DOWNLOAD THIS FELLOW TRUMP SUPPORTERS!!

attributes.review:
i downloaded this app in hopes of further connecting myself to our lord, mr trump. unfortunately the only thing i am now connected to is twelve different illegal pornography websites, my phone is now glitching and working very slowly, i believe i have gotten some sort of virus from this app. i donâ€™t understand how someone as good and innocent as our courageous leader could have connections to porn websites but it does scare me. i hope he will bring this issue up in one of his many important tweets, this is a terrible issue that is negatively impacting each and everyone of us patriotic americans. i asked my friend Susanna if she was having the same problems and hers were even worse, her phone has stopped working completely, she was devastated when this happened because she was in the process of making a purchase from vineyard vines. this just shows that we need to be therefore each other in these devastating times, my heart goes out to all of those who are effected by this horrible situation, we will get through this together. 
~love 
Anneleigh Grace

attributes.title: Fellow Trump Supporters

attributes.review:
Hello, Iâ€™m a huge trump supporter! I truly believe he will make America great again, or even better than it already is. I downloaded this app to be more involved with my favorite presentâ€™s campaign. I really just want to show as much support as I can towards the Trump 2020 campaign! I plan on voting for him again therefore I also downloaded this app to get even more information on the campaign. Unfortunately, not even 10 minutes after I had downloaded this app I got a notification informing me that my credit card had been used to buy the newest IPhone! This obviously wasnâ€™t me so I shut my card down, but this continued to happen even after my bank had dealt with my problem. A day after downloading the app I had discovered that some of my passwords had been leaked. Problems of the sort continued to happen until I took my phone to my local T-Mobile and my assistant informed me it was in fact this app that had assisted these hackers in getting information on me! I still support Trumpâ€™s campaign, but I am highly disappointed in him for not fully keeping up with his peopleâ€™s internet privacy! Thank you for reading!
